name: Multiplayer Car Contest
description:
Show off your Drift Car Driving skills to smash & crash stunt car in extreme car racing multiplayer Car Demolition Race on appstore games and be the best wreckfest car crash multiplayer car contest car racer that everyone envies. You have to hit and smash other cars to crash them before they damage you and your stunt car damage reaches to 100% that will result in level failed. Evade hurdles such as bundles of straw and tires that will damage your car stunt little bit but collision with offroad games walls will result in enormous damage to your multiplayer car racing games stunt contest. Best is to car stunt crash against enemy vehicles to knock out them to survive the multiplayer car games demolition arena


Multiplayer Car contest Features
• Challenging Demolition Derbies Extreme Car Racing levels.
• multiplayer Car contest games for kids with Realistic HD graphics and engaging sound effects.
• Realistic car crash, destruction and damage
• Real Car Physics with smooth driving controls
• Amazing Derby Car Models and Heavy Trucks
• The game takes place inside a large stadium.
• Different obstacles and enemy vehicles
